original: // snga 'gyur bka' ma'i drag dmar 'o bran lugs kyi brgyud 'debs ni /
analyzed: snga gyur bka ma drag dmar mang bran lugs kyi brgyud debs ni

original: khyab bdag gdod ma'i mgon po 'od mi 'gyur //
analyzed: khyab bdag gdod ma mgon po d mi gyur

original: 'phags mchog snying rje'i dbang phyug mig mi 'dzum //
analyzed: phag mchog snying rje dbang phyug mig mi dzum

original: rtsa gsum kun 'dus pad+ma 'byung gnas la //
analyzed: rtsa gsum kun du pad+ma byung gnas la

original: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol

original: 'phags bzhi bskyed yum dbyings phyug mkhar chen gza' //
analyzed: phag bzhi skyed yum dbyings phyug mkhar chen gza

original: grub pa'i dbang phyug 'o bran dpal 'byung dang // 'byung bzhir dbang bsgyur 'o bran dbang phyug la //
analyzed: grub ba dbang phyug mang bran dpal byung dang byung bzhir dbang sgyur mang bran dbang phyug la

original: gsol ba 'debs thog med mthu mnga' 'o bran chos 'byung dang // drag rtsal nus thob 'o bran grags pa'i mtshan //
analyzed: gsol ba debs thogs med mthu mnga mang bran chos byung dang drag rtsal nus thob mang bran grags ba mtshan

original: 'khor 'das dbang bsgrur 'o bran dbang rgyal la //
analyzed: khor da dbang bsgrur mang bran dbang rgyal la

original: gsol ba 'debs gsang chen mdzod brnyes 'o bran rta mchog rgyal //
analyzed: gsol ba debs gsang chen mdzod brnyes mang bran rta mchog rgyal

original: lta dgongs gdengs ldan 'o bran ri rab brtan //
analyzed: lta dgongs gdeng ldan mang bran ri rab brtan

original: nyi ma rgyal mtshan kun dga' blo gros la //
analyzed: nyi ma rgyal mtshan kun dga blo gros la

original: gsol ba 'debs rin chen chos rgyal tshul khrims dbang phyug dang // dkon mchog 'bangs dang dbang phyug rdo rje'i mtshan //
analyzed: gsol ba debs rin chen chos rgyal tshul khrims dbang phyug dang dkon(d) mchog bang dang dbang phyug rdo rje mtshan

original: gtsug lag rgya mtsho karma lung rig la //
analyzed: gtsug lag rgya mtsho karma lung rig la

original: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol

original: snga 'gyur bstan pa'i nyi ma gter bdag gling //
analyzed: snga gyur ston ba nyi ma gter bdag gling

original: theg mchog bstan 'dzin kun bzang rnam par rgyal //
analyzed: theg mchog ston dzin kun bzang rnam ba rgyal

original: gsang sngags bstan 'dzin mthu stobs rnam rgyal la //
analyzed: gsang sngags ston dzin mthu stobs rnam rgyal la

original: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol

original: mdzod lnga'i shing rta blo gros pha mtha' yas //
analyzed: mdzod lnga shing rta blo gros pha mtha yas

original: thub bstan nyin byed rgyal mtshan 'od zer zhabs //
analyzed: thub ston nyin byed rgyal mtshan d zer zhabs

original: bka' drin mnyam med rtsa ba'i bla ma la //
analyzed: bka drin mnyam med rtsa ba bla ma la

original: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol

original: rab 'byams dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i spyi dpal che //
analyzed: rab byam dkyil khor rgya mtsho spyi dpal che

original: che ba'i che mchog pad+ma drag po rtsal //
analyzed: che ba che mchog pad+ma drag po rtsal

original: gnas gsum mkha' 'gro rgyud gsum srung ma la //
analyzed: gnas gsum mkha gro brgyud gsum srung ma la

original: gsol ba 'debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: gsol ba debs so mchog thun dngos grub stsol

original: dbang gi rgyud smin dam tshig rnam par dag /
analyzed: dbang gi brgyud smin dam tshig rnam ba dag

original: bskyed rdzogs don la rang byan tshud pa dang // mchog thun dngos grub yid bzhin grub nas kyang //
analyzed: skyed rdzogs don la rang byan tshud ba dang mchog thun dngos grub yid bzhin grub nas kyang

original: mkha' mnyam 'gro ba kun bzang sar 'god shog //
analyzed: mkha mnyam gro ba kun bzang sar god shog

original: zhes pa'ang pad+ma ma nis so //
analyzed: zhes ba pad+ma ma nis so
